Detailed Description

Class for the scheduled events.

Events are scheduled to occurr at time "time"; the can involve one particle, two particles or be general collective events

If the event involves a single particle, "i" is the index of the particle and "nci" is the number of collision suffered by the i-th particle at the scheduling time

If the event involves two particles, their indices are "i" and "j" and "nci", "ncj" are the number of collision suffered by the involved particles at the scheduling time
